refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the internal pointer of an array to its first element

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.notes;
The return value for an empty array is indistinguishable from the return value in case of an array which has a bool &false; first element. To properly check the value of the first element of an array which may contain &false; elements, first check the count of the array, or check that key is not &null;, after calling reset.
